name: Veyla
appearance: Translucent, sea-glass skin veined with pale emerald. Eyes catch light like facets; fingertips always warm from kiln work. Wears a shawl threaded with cullet charms.
character: Ambitious and charming; uses wit like a blade. Keeps score on favors and debts as carefully as annealing times.
talents: skin senses temperature shifts by a breath
can read a flame’s ‘mood’ from its color
dreams: Invent a mirror that maps stormpaths from the Resonant Gate’s chords
Replace bone conduits with her resin-glass lattice
secrets: Sells lie-dulling hand mirrors to the Night-Glass for blackmail trades
Hid a cracked crucible that produces mirrors which refuse to reflect their maker’s lies
